versos: (telleth) Psalm 19:1 - "The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.";;;
(stablish) 1 Thessalonians 3:13 - "To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God, even our Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints.";;;
(casting) 1 Peter 5:7: "casting all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.";;;
(shields) Psalm 47:9 - The nobles of the nations assemble as the people of the God of Abraham, for the kings of the earth belong to God; he is greatly exalted.;;;
(joram) 2 Kings 8:16 - "In the fifth year of joram son of Ahab king of Israel, when Jehoshaphat was king of Judah, Jehoram son of Jehoshaphat began his reign as king of Judah.";;;
(recorder) 2 Kings 18:34 - "Where are the gods of Hamath and Arpad Where are the gods of Sepharvaim, Hena and Ivvah Have they rescued Samaria from my hand";;;

(scribe) Matthew 23:34 - "Therefore I am sending you prophets and scribes and some of them you will kill and crucify, and some of them you will flog in your synagogues and pursue from town to town,";;;
(gihon) "And the fourth river is Euphrates." - Genesis 2:14;;;
(barak) Judges 5:2 - "When the leaders lead in Israel, when the people willingly offer themselves, bless the Lord";;;
(jael) Judges 4:17 - "But Sisera fled on foot to the tent of jael, the wife of Heber the Kenite, because there was an alliance between Jabin king of Hazor and the family of Heber the Kenite.";;;
(hanun) 2 Chronicles 28:15 - And the men who have been mentioned by name rose and took the captives

(thinkest) Philippians 4:8 - "Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honest, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.";;;
(bath) 2 Kings 5:10: Elisha sent a messenger to say to him, "Go, wash yourself seven times in the Jordan, and your flesh will be restored and you will be cleansed.";;;
(uriah) 2 Samuel 11:3 - "And David sent and inquired about the woman. And one said, Is not this Bathsheba, the daughter of Eliam, the wife of uriah the Hittite;;;
(fools) Psalm 14:1 - "The fool says in his heart, There is no God.";;;
(sending) John 20:21 - "Again Jesus said, 'Peace be with you As the Father has sent me, I am sending you.'";;;
(robes) Genesis 37:3 - Now Israel loved Joseph more than any of his other sons, because he had been born to him in his old age; and he made an ornate robe for him.;;;
(mule) "His father had never failed to do the same. He even drove the stubborn mule he had given his father, but he did not turn to the Lord." - 1 Kings 12:14;;;
